front.title: Extended information of Semantic Definition Format (SDF) for Digital Twin

abstract.t: An SDF specification can describe the definition of Things, i.e., physical objects and their associated interactions, and express the various information that is exchanged for these interactions. Therefore, the SDF format can be used to define the behavior of an object and its associated data model and interaction model in a digital twin system that includes the object as a component. In a digital twin system, interactions between physical and virtual objects, as well as interactions of objects existing in different digital twin systems, are performed over a network, making it important to provide location information of objects during interactions. This document specifies the extension of SDF to represent the location information of objects.
